title: Science Wars: Institute vs Enclave
fractured_timeline_context: The Institute (FO4, 2287) and the Enclave (FO2/FO3, 2241/2277) both exist simultaneously. Both consider themselves humanity's best hope. Both have advanced technology. Both are supremacists who view wastelanders as inferior. Now they've discovered each other - and they're NOT friends.
premise: The Institute's Father and the Enclave's Colonel Autumn have entered a cold war over who represents 'true humanity.' The Institute sees the Enclave as barbaric fascists. The Enclave sees synths as abominations. You're caught in the middle of a technological arms race between two of the wasteland's most dangerous factions.

stages.name: When Titans Meet
stages.description: An Institute courser team encountered Enclave troops at Helios One. Both sides opened fire. Now both factions want you to spy on the other.

objectives.text: Infiltrate the Institute (via relay or Vault 77 connection)
optional_approaches: Use Jax Voss's glitching to phase in

objectives.text: Infiltrate Enclave base (Raven Rock or Adams AFB ruins)
optional_approaches: Use Harlan Voss's old NCR connections

objectives.text: Report findings to both factions (or betray one)

stages.name: The Arms Race
stages.description: Both factions are developing super-weapons. Institute is building army of Gen-3 synths with FEV immunity. Enclave is upgrading their Hellfire armor with Institute-killing protocols.

player_choice.option3: Sabotage both (work with Railroad or Brotherhood)
player_choice.option4: Steal tech from both for personal use

stages.name: Two Visions of Humanity
stages.description: Father and Colonel Autumn agree to a debate at Hoover Dam. They want you to moderate. This won't end peacefully.
debate_topics: Who should lead the wasteland? (Scientists vs Military)
Is democracy dead? (Institute technocracy vs Enclave oligarchy)
Should mutants exist? (Both say no, but for different reasons)
outcomes: Broker peace (both factions ally AGAINST you for seeing their similarity)
Support Institute (Enclave becomes enemy, synth army unlocked)
Support Enclave (Institute becomes enemy, power armor upgrades)
Reveal they're the same (both try to kill you, wasteland celebrates)

endings.ending_enclave_victory: Enclave nukes the Institute, pure humanity restored
endings.ending_mutual_destruction: Both factions destroy each other, wasteland is free
endings.ending_unholy_alliance: You convince them to ally - worst timeline, dystopian nightmare

cross_timeline_meta: This quest only exists because timelines are fractured. FO4's Institute and FO2/FO3's Enclave never coexisted in canon. That's what makes this special.

unique_items: X-01 Power Armor with Institute mods
Courser Coat with Enclave stealth field
